module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>news`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>news` ( `newsId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `content` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `columns` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `startsAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `endsAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`newsId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `title` (`title`), KEY `type` (`type`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
